articles.title: Conservative activist Charlie Kirk in critical condition after being shot at Utah college event
articles.description:
“We are confirming that he was shot and we are praying for Charlie,” said Aubrey Laitsch, public relations manager for Turning Point USA.

The post Conservative activist Charlie Kirk in critical condition after being shot at Utah college event appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Conservative activist Charlie Kirk was shot at a Utah college event on September 10.
Turning Point USA confirmed Kirk's critical condition; prayers are being offered for his recovery.
Local Boston residents may see increased security at political events following this incident.

articles.title: Patriots’ defensive coordinator Terrell Williams will be away from team for a few days
articles.description:
An unforeseen health issue came up, coach Mike Vrabel said.

The post Patriots’ defensive coordinator Terrell Williams will be away from team for a few days appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots' defensive coordinator Terrell Williams will be away due to a health issue.
Coach Mike Vrabel confirmed the absence on September 10, 2025.
Williams' absence may affect team preparations ahead of upcoming games.

articles.title: 8 unforgettable fall destinations in Vermont, according to Boston.com readers
articles.description:
Vermont has spectacular fall views "that even the best painter can't duplicate," wrote a reader.

The post 8 unforgettable fall destinations in Vermont, according to Boston.com readers appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Boston.com readers highlight 8 top fall destinations in Vermont for local travelers.
Vermont's fall views praised for their beauty, attracting Boston residents seeking scenic getaways.
Local tourism may increase as Boston residents explore Vermont's picturesque autumn landscapes.

articles.title: Readers: Are cider doughnuts ever bad?
articles.description:
Cider doughnuts are a classic fall treat. We want to know what makes them so good, and are they ever really that bad?

The post Readers: Are cider doughnuts ever bad? appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Cider doughnuts are a popular fall treat among Boston residents.
Local bakeries report increased sales of cider doughnuts each September.
Community discussions highlight preferences for quality and flavor in local cider doughnuts.
